name: Fitbit
0:
”Alexa, ask Fitbit how I'm doing today.”
”Alexa, ask Fitbit how I slept last night.”
”Alexa, ask Fitbit how many steps I've taken.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fitbit
Developer Terms of Use
des:
After activating the Fitbit skill on Amazon Alexa, here are all the things you can do:

On Amazon Alexa devices, you can ask for daily Fitbit progress such as if you hit your sleep goal, how you did yesterday, or just get a quick update on the stats you care about the most. Simply say: 
• “Alexa, ask Fitbit how I’m doing today.”
• “Alexa, ask Fitbit how I slept last night.”
• “Alexa, ask Fitbit how many steps I’ve taken.”

On Fitbit devices,* you can use Amazon Alexa Built-in to:
• Check the weather
• Set reminders
• Start an exercise

*This feature is only supported for the following Fitbit devices: Versa 2, Versa 3, and Sense.

If you’d like to learn more about what Alexa can do with Fitbit, you can find more information here: (https://help.fitbit.com/articles/en_US/Help_article/2009.htm).
